title: Apertre Event Platform
description: Enterprise-grade event platform serving 5000+ daily active developers. Built with modern Japanese 'kaizen' principles of continuous improvement, featuring real-time GitHub API integration for contribution tracking.

title: Student Chapter Web Portal
description: Monorepo-based web ecosystem for engineering student community. Embracing 'mono no aware' - the beauty of impermanence - through modular, maintainable architecture.

title: Redis Clone in Go
description: Low-level systems programming masterpiece. Built from scratch with 'shokunin' craftsmanship - dedicated artisan spirit. Features complete protocol compliance and memory optimization.
